name: Alien Invasion - made with raylib 3.5
description:
A simple shoot 'em up game made in C, using raylib! Shoot aliens, avoid bullets, and get the highest score! Use your shield and fill up the energy bar to get a higher score. 

Special thanks to Vasiliki Zafeiri for making the pilot's animations and the game's logo! Find more of her work on Instagram at @hunnibird !

Controls

Move / Navigate↑, ↓, ←, →Shoot missileSpacebarUse shieldXPause gamePStart / Restart gameEnterGo back to title screen (in pause mode)B

Credits

  • Developer - Michael Aretakis (mixalouis)
  • Animation - Vasiliki Zafeiri(hunnibird), mixalouis
  • Sprites - davexunit, jerom, master484, Ivan Bridgewater, arboris
  • Music & Sfx - Little Robot Sound Factory, TinyWorlds, OwlishMedia, Joth
  • Font - Clint Bellanger

Click here to see the game's source code on my GitHub page.
